1_1Mr36Z4TSbWQ236NfvRPeLn3qsAwngBzMd.body: The whole point of ZeroNet is to be COMPLETELY uncensored. It does have it's downsides, but welcome to the DarkNet. This is why the Clear Net exists so that you can block or not be expose to topics that aren't "socially acceptable". If you don't like it, don't click on it. I definitely do NOT support the ability to "downvote" threads in order to hid them from the general view. I DO support the ability to "block" a user or thread, but ONLY so that it's hidden on YOUR side, and not publicly.
